body: A sea witch can influence the attitude of water-dwelling animals and animals that live along coasts and shores, including birds, as if using wild empathy. The sea witch uses her witch level as her druid level for this ability. If the sea witch has wild empathy from another class, her witch levels stack with the other class's levels to determine her wild empathy bonus for these kinds of creatures. This ability replaces the witch's 1st-level hex.
name: Sea Creature Empathy
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Witch/Witch Archetypes/Sea Witch/Sea Creature Empathy
